Name: Loved Up
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: Tequila predominates in this rusty coloured drink, which also features orange and berry fruit.
History: Adapted from a cocktail discovered in 2002 at the Merc Bar, New York City, where the original name was listed as simply 'Love'.
Nutrition: One serving of Loved Up contains 228 calories
